gw.api.domain.charge

Interface ChargeInitializer.Entry

  • Enclosing interface:
    ChargeInitializer

    public static interface ChargeInitializer.Entry
    Configures one InvoiceItem on the Charge| configured by the enclosing {@link ChargeInitializer}.

        Set an extension property on a new InvoiceItem
        Parameters:
        prop - extension property info
        value - value to be stored in extension property
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if property reference is not a valid extension property
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the initializer has already been executed.

      • addToExtensionArrayProperty

        <T> void addToExtensionArrayProperty(PropertyReference<InvoiceItem,T[]> prop,
                                   T value)
        Add a value to an extension array property on new InvoiceItem object that hasn't been initialized yet An example of a typical call from Gosu: addToExtensionArrayProperty(InvoiceItem#ItemEvents, itemEvent) An example of a typical call from Java: addToExtensionArrayProperty(new PropertyReference(InvoiceItem.TYPE.get(), "ItemEvents"), itemEvent)
        Parameters:
        prop - extension array property info
        value - the value to be added to the array
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if property reference is not a valid extension array property, or if value is null
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the initializer has already been executed.

      • removeFromExtensionArrayProperty

        <T> void removeFromExtensionArrayProperty(PropertyReference<InvoiceItem,T[]> prop,
                                        T value)
        Remove a value from an extension array property on new InvoiceItem object that hasn't been initialized yet An example of a typical call from Gosu: removeFromExtensionArrayProperty(InvoiceItem#ItemEvents, itemEvent) An example of a typical call from Java: removeFromExtensionArrayProperty(new PropertyReference(InvoiceItem.TYPE.get(), "ItemEvents"), itemEvent)
        Parameters:
        prop - extension array property info
        value - the value to be removed from the array
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if property reference is not a valid extension array property, or if value is null
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the initializer has already been executed.

      • getExtensionArrayProperties

        <T> java.util.List<T> getExtensionArrayProperties(PropertyReference<InvoiceItem,T[]> prop)
